Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is more of a general approach to topics while the teacher can give real examples and explain the material much more in detail

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI is quick and easy to use while the teacher is sometimes harder to understand
